Author: GitHub
Description:
"Everything is way more plug and play." In this clip from The GitHub Podcast, our hosts discuss why open standards like the Model Context Protocol (MCP) are a huge win for transparency and help developers avoid vendor lock-in, giving you the freedom to choose the right AI tools for your needs.

#MCP #OpenSource #GitHub

Title: Why open standards are a huge win for AI transparency
